Bay City GM



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Wilmer Bowen
Dear Sir,
Wilmer Bowen is hitting the ball well at A Peoria Chiefs!
He has an AVG of .339, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
